comments.body: Any reason why you are not just using `create this`?
Also as above a comment would be great. Presumably here the critical part is that this is an infinite loop?

diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,131 @@
+-- Copyright (c) 2020 Digital Asset (Switzerland) GmbH and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+-- SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
+
+
+module Recursion where
+
+type IouCid = ContractId Iou
+
+template Iou
+  with
+    issuer : Party
+    owner : Party
+    currency : Text
+    amount : Decimal
+    observers : [Party]
+  where
+
+    signatory issuer, owner
+
+    observer observers
+
+    controller owner can
+
+      -- Test recursion A
+
+      nonconsuming TestRecA : IouCid
+        do
+          archive self
+          _ <- create this with amount = amount
